channel.title: Need help with a rsps client
channel.description:
Hey guy's so I've been trying to run a rsps for 2 day's now and I've been looking through all the server downloads and I have had multiple problems for all of them. None of them have I even been able to merely LOG IN to, just to try them out. But I found one that I love the source of, the pictures look like a server I used to play which I loved. So I ran the source and it's working fine but the client had the following error "Error: Could not find or load main class client". Now I really love this source so I want to play this really bad and make it into a server. So can somebody please help me. I've already looked all over the web for solutions and none of them worked.
The download page is here:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,633225.0.html If you wanted to test to see if it even works for you. I'm willing to screenshare through skype to make it work, please help. Thanks.

item.title: Need help with a rsps client
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.source: Need help with a rsps client

item.title: Need help with a rsps client
item.dc:creator: @em0bunny em0bunny
item.description:
@em0bunny wrote:

Actually got a coding friend to help me XD My code looked like :@echo off
title Client
color 5d
cd ./locandclass/
“C:/Program files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

But when I made it look like this:@echo off
title Client
color 5d
cd ./locandclass/
“C:/Program files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp .; client 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

It fixed it, all I had to add was: -cp .;

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a rsps client

item.title: Need help with a rsps client
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

Have you changed the Ip to your local host in your client.java?

Read full topic
